name: Snow Cat
description: The Snow Cat is a medium-sized, agile beast thriving in snowy terrains. It has a sleek body with strong limbs, sharp claws, and a keen sense of its surroundings.
memorable: This ambush predator excels in snowy environments and can grapple surprised prey, making it a stealthy threat.
goals: Hunting prey and surviving in its cold habitat.
relations: Can be encountered alongside other snowy beasts.
strengths: Highly agile with keen senses, allowing it to be an effective ambusher.
weaknesses: Low hit points make it fragile in prolonged encounters.
attacks: Bite attack deals piercing damage; claw attack inflicts slashing damage.
most_powerful_ability: Stalker ability lets it grapple surprised foes efficiently.
senses: Possesses keen senses, granting advantage on perception checks related to sight, hearing, or smell.
skills: Skilled in stealth and perception, making it difficult to detect.
additional_information: Advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks in snow.
Effective ambush predator with outdoor survival skills.
Relies on stealth and surprise for hunting.
Can climb quickly to escape threats or reposition.
test_queries: medium-sized ambush predator with keen senses
climbing snow cat that hunts effectively
